user.title: Search Address
user.description: Enter your street address to find your bin collection schedule.

select.title: Select Address
select.description: Multiple addresses found. Please select yours.

confirm.title: Confirm Address
confirm.description:
Set up bin collection tracking for:

**{address}**

Press Submit to confirm.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the Mount Alexander council website. Please try again later.
error.no_results: No addresses found. Try a more specific search (e.g. '120 Barker St Castlemaine').

abort.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the waste collection service.
abort.no_services: No bin collection services found for this address.
